nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Microfighters Episode 1: Bantha Shakes
"LEGO Star Wars: Microfighters Episode 1: Bantha Shakes" is a short LEGO original video that features the line of Microfighters. It was uploaded on February 19, 2014.

Han Solo is on Tatooine, where he is taunted by an Imperial crewman after crashing into him at the Mos Eisley Diner. They join the Boonta Eve Classic, and when the officer is arrested, Solo goes on to win.
It was originally released on January 26, 2014 as the LEGO Star Wars: Microfighters animation, a sort of trailer for LEGO Star Wars: Microfighters mobile game.
It features two of the fangirls from LEGO Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Out.
